0x6E31E993.name: GET_PLAYER_PED

params.name: playerSrc
params.description: The player source, passed as a string.

0x6E31E993.description: Used to get the player's Ped Entity ID when a valid `playerSrc` is passed.

examples.code:
-- Let's assume source is a valid ID
local pedId = GetPlayerPed(source);

-- If pedId is valid (not equal to 0)
if pedId ~= 0 then
    -- Do something with this ped!
end

0x6E31E993.resultsDescription: Returns a valid Ped Entity ID if the passed `playerSrc` is valid, `0` if not.
